OwnerUser.AboutMe: Iâ€™m an author and a consultant who specializes in character codes, localization, web authoring, accessibility, and typography. Author of Unicode Explained and Going Global with JavaScript and Globalize.js.

Body:
Yes, there are several systems of numeral symbols in active use; for example, Chinese numbers are in very active use.

Many of the systems are described to some extent in the Unicode Standard; start from section 15.3 Numerals to find such info.
